thread.title: EFF playing of the #FeesMustFall card was effective - expert
thread.title_full: EFF playing of the #FeesMustFall card was effective - expert | News24

author: news24.com
title: EFF playing of the #FeesMustFall card was effective - expert
text:
Cape Town - The EFF did an effective job of playing the #FeesMustFall card to their political advantage as they attempted to postpone the mini budget, political analyst Daniel Silke said on Wednesday.
Outside of Parliament, student protests played into the 'disruptive' style of politics exercised by the EFF and they are well placed to emulate the disruption taking place in the streets of Cape Town outside parliament within the Chamber, he said.
Silke said it is a classic tale of two countries: MPs locked into a political vacuum in Parliament while emotions, frustrations and anger erupted just steps away outside.
He said events in Parliament would damage relations between the electorate and the executive. Political parties should be concerned.
